title: Garmin Rallys with dual XC power, Shimano SPD-SL cleat compatibility & swappable pedal bodies
content: Shortly after finalizing their purchase of MetriGear Inc., Garmin entered the power meter arena around 2011 with the Vector road pedal (pictured below). The pedal unit gave the rider freedom to take power from bike to bike, and although road only, it was the start of a new way for Garmin to measure power. In […]
author: Jordan Villella
